data.name: Kusan : City of Wolves
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER


About the Game

About the game

In ‘Kusan: City of Wolves’, you are a veteran and a fixer with combat prosthetic replacing your left arm. While working as a fixer in the alley of port city of ‘Kusan’, you encounter a girl who can put the city in danger and has caught the attention of your former superior to use her in his coup. She asks you - her father’s former comrade - to protect her. Save the girl against the schemes of your former comrades who once shared life and death with you.

This is ‘Kusan’, a port city set in the near future of Korea, filled with corruption and enemies crazed with drugs and cash. In here a light shining in darkness may be the gunfire of your enemies. In here you can become expert in unarmed combat, daggers and various weaponry through countless fights and deaths. Sharpen your skills, invest in them, let the bodies hit the floor before yours hits first.

Protect the girl. Confront the will of your fallen comrades. You are faster and stronger than any beast in this city of 'Kusan'.

Fight powerful enemies



Comics style cutscene

data.short_description: ‘Kusan : City of Wolves’ is a hardcore top-down shooter set in the bloody port city of the asia in the near future. Protect the girl against the coup plan of an old comrades. Be an expert in combat skills, prosthetics, guns and knife. The fiercest beast in the city, you are.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit) | Windows 8 (64bit) | Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit) | Windows 8 (64bit) | Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes content that is not suitable for all ages or that may be inappropriate for use at work.
